Title: Former presidents (except Zapatero) denounce Maduro and Chavismo ...
Description: Former presidents (except Zapatero) denounce Maduro and Chavismo for state terrorismThirty-one former presidents of Latin American republics and three former presidents of the Spanish government have filed a complaint with the Prosecutor of the International Criminal Court (ICC) against the regime of Nicolás Maduro and with express accusations against the Venezuelan Army. Former Colombian President Andrés Pastrana Arango appeared before the Court on behalf of all of them. Among the signatories are Felipe González, José María Aznar and Mariano Rajoy.-Today we are asking the ICC Prosecutor to urgently intervene so that those most responsible for these crimes against humanity are subject to appropriate measures by the ICC,- said Andrés Pastrana.

Title: 🖼 Teenager detained in Carúpano for WhatsApp message is in a del...
Description: Teenager detained in Carúpano for WhatsApp message is in a delicate state of healthA nervous breakdown, which caused brain damage, is part of the consequences of the arrest of Lauriannys Valentina Cedeño Farías, 17 years old, after being detained on August 14 for sending a WhatsApp message against the results of the July 28 process announced by the National Electoral Council (CNE).The incident occurred in Carúpano, Sucre state, when a group of officials entered her house and took her away.The NGO Justicia, Encuentro y Perdón (JEP) warned that while the young woman was in a health center, she was prosecuted without the right to defense for the crime of instigating hatred and was sentenced to deprivation of liberty.

Title: Maduro appointed Delcy Rodríguez as Petroleum Minister and Vice P...
Description: Maduro appointed Delcy Rodríguez as Petroleum Minister and Vice PresidentMaduro removed Pedro Rafael Tellechea from his position, where he served as Minister of Petroleum and president of Petróleos de Venezuela, handing the crude oil portfolio to Rodríguez and the state portfolio to Hector Obregón.-We are going to carry out a profound remodeling of the national government and assemble a new team that will allow us to navigate this new era, accelerate and deepen the changes that the people need, consolidate the national dialogue, because there is room for all of us here, cure hatred and continue on the path of the comprehensive recovery of Venezuela, which is where we are going to arrive,- said Maduro.

Title: Number of political prisoners has increased fivefold since the el...
Description: Number of political prisoners has increased fivefold since the elections: 1,674 detainees reportedThe NGO Foro Penal stated that the number of political prisoners has increased considerably since the presidential elections on July 28, comparing the figures of 305 as of July 27 and 1,674 as of August 24, quintupling the figure in less than a month of crisis.-Political prisoners includes people who remain deprived of their freedom. It does not yet include all those who have been arrested and released or are being held under short-term arrest, for 48 hours,-

Title: 🇻🇪🇦🇷Argentine embassy employee in Caracas was released after ...
Description: 🇻🇪🇦🇷Argentine embassy employee in Caracas was released after diplomatic effortsVenezuelan Carlos Barraza, who has worked for more than 20 years at the Argentine embassy in Caracas, was released this Saturday by the government of Nicolás Maduro; after complaints against his detention and diplomatic efforts.It has emerged that the Bolivarian National Intelligence Service (Sebin) brutally detained Carlos Barraza at his home on Friday night, Infobae reported.It was learned that Barraza was arrested in connection with the theft of $90,000 from the account of the Argentine embassy in Venezuela. The money was used to pay for the maintenance of the diplomatic headquarters, the consulate and the ambassador's residence.

Title: Chavismo invites to participate in communal elections this day Au...
Description: Chavismo invites to participate in communal elections this day August 25: People over 15 years old will be able to voteCNE called on all Venezuelans over 15 years of age to vote in the second National Popular Consultation to be held on Sunday, August 25.-All Venezuelans aged 15 and over are invited to participate on Sunday,- said Ana María Cabrera, member of the commission and spokesperson for the Unidos por el Gigante Commune in Miranda state, at a press conference from the Ministry for Communes and Social Movements.

Title: 🔁🎬🖼 🇻🇪🇻🇪❌👤❌ — 📺 The Venezuelan regime has turned the con...
Description: Forwarded From Tupi Report 🇧🇷🇻🇪🇻🇪❌👤❌ — 📺 The Venezuelan regime has turned the conflict between Nicolás Maduro and Elon Musk into the theme of an episode of -Súper Bigote- (Super Mustache), an animated series produced by state TV for propaganda and child indoctrination purposes.💬 The superhero in the series is based on Maduro and shares his characteristic mustache. With a cape, worker's helmet, and iron fist, he -fights the American empire and other enemies, including opposition members.-⁉️ In a recently released episode, Super Bigote's enemy is Musk, depicted as the Devil—he has hair shaped like horns, long nails, and sits in an office chair with a pentagram on it. He also wears an armband resembling that of the Nazis, but with the logo of the social network he owns.💥 Súper Bigote responds by saying that in this context, he is -David against Goliath,- a reference to the biblical story of David, the small and brave defender of his people, who defeated a much larger and more powerful adversary, the giant Goliath.Source 🖇 Video is too big

Title: 🇨🇴🇧🇷Lula and Petro warn that the -credibility- of the June 28...
Description: 🇨🇴🇧🇷Lula and Petro warn that the -credibility- of the June 28 result depends on the publication of -disaggregated and verifiable data-The presidents of Brazil and Colombia, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva and Gustavo Petro, insisted this Saturday on the need to disseminate the electoral records -broken down by voting table-, after the Supreme Court of Justice (TSJ) validated the alleged victory of Nicolás Maduro.-Both presidents remain convinced that the credibility of the electoral process can only be restored through the transparent publication of disaggregated and verifiable data,- the joint statement said.

Title: Ecuador decrees migration amnesty and regularization for Venezuel...
Description: Ecuador decrees migration amnesty and regularization for Venezuelan migrantsThe Ecuadorian government decided on Friday to grant an immigration amnesty and establish a new regularization process for Venezuelans and their families who are in the country and who have an expired certificate of immigration status or who have not yet obtained a special visa.The Ecuadorian Ministry of the Interior must renew the certificates and authorizations of permanence, in order to guarantee that the beneficiaries can access the renewed Virte II visa, which will be valid for two years and may be extended only once and for the same period.

Title: Maduro's government calls the rejection of the TSJ ruling by 11 c...
Description: Maduro's government calls the rejection of the TSJ ruling by 11 countries unacceptableOn Friday, August 23, the government of Nicolás Maduro accused the 11 American countries whose governments do not recognize the electoral victory of the official candidate for reelection in the presidential elections of July 28, which, although ratified by the Supreme Court of Justice (TSJ), continues to be questioned by a large part of the international community, of being violent accomplices.-These countries intend to continue violating international law, committing an unacceptable act of interference in matters that only concern Venezuelans,- the document reads.

Title: 🇪🇺 EU will not recognize Maduro as president until the vote act...
Description: 🇪🇺 EU will not recognize Maduro as president until the vote acts are verifiedThe High Representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy, Josep Borrell, announced this Friday that the EU will not recognize Nicolás Maduro as president of Venezuela until the electoral records are handed over and can be verified. He added that the twenty-seven Member States are -currently- trying to establish a position on the matter and, if it is not established now, he announced that the position will be determined at the Council of Foreign Ministers next week.

Title: 🔁🖼 🇻🇪❌🇻🇪🪖 — On August 17, 2024 AD, according to multiple r...
Description: Forwarded From Bellum Acta - Intel, Urgent News and Archives🇻🇪❌🇻🇪🪖 — On August 17, 2024 AD, according to multiple reports from Venezuelan media, a number of high ranking commanders in the Venezuelan military appear to have been removed from their posts.➡️ Commanders of armoured brigades, artillery and engineering brigades as well as military police have all been removed (i.e. purged) under orders of the Chavista Regime📝 The generals were in the 11th Armored Brigade in Zulia; the 32nd Military Police Brigade in Caracas, the 62nd Combat Engineer Brigade of the state of Táchira; the 41st Armored Brigade in Carabobo and the Guárico Field Artillery Brigade were all purged🔗 CastoOcando.com (@cocando)

Title: Rodríguez announces reform of the political parties law to preven...
Description: Rodríguez announces reform of the political parties law to prevent -fascists- from competing in electionsThe president of the legislature, Jorge Rodríguez, announced an upcoming reform of the Law on Political Parties, Public Meetings and Demonstrations, aimed at preventing -fascists,- referring to opposition leaders, from running for elected office in Venezuela, in connection with the parliamentary and regional elections to be held in 2025.Among the -fascists,- Rodriguez included those who call for coups, foreign invasions and the commission of crimes such as political assassinations, as well as those who do not abide by the TSJ ruling that validates the election results of July 28.

Title: 🇨🇱 President Gabriel Boric rejects the TSJ ruling: -it ends up ...
Description: 🇨🇱 President Gabriel Boric rejects the TSJ ruling: -it ends up consolidating the fraud-The Chilean president indicated in a message on his X account:-Today the Venezuelan Supreme Court has finally consolidated the fraud. The Maduro regime obviously welcomes with enthusiasm its sentence, which will be marked by infamy. There is no doubt that we are facing a dictatorship that falsifies elections, represses those who think differently and is indifferent to the largest exile in the world, comparable only to that of Syria as a result of a war.-

Title: 🔁🖼 🌐📰🇻🇪🇻🇪 — The international agencies EFE, AP, and Europ...
Description: Forwarded From Tupi Report 🇧🇷🌐📰🇻🇪🇻🇪 — The international agencies EFE, AP, and Europa Press have been accused of spreading disinformation favorable to Nicolás Maduro's regime.⁉️ According to the Orwell Report, these agencies published headlines that lead people to believe that the Supreme Court of Justice of Venezuela, controlled by the Chavista regime, is an independent body. EFE, after facing criticism on social media, was forced to correct its content.❗️ The report also revealed that AP twice published a biased headline on its X account, contributing to confusion about the legitimacy of the Venezuelan electoral process.Source 🖇

Title: 🎬 TSJ validates -the results issued by the CNE where Nicolás Mad...
Description: TSJ validates -the results issued by the CNE where Nicolás Maduro was elected-Caryslia Beatriz Rodríguez, president of the TSJ, said on Thursday that the highest court -certifies in an unobjectionable manner the expert material and validates the results issued by the CNE where Nicolás Maduro was elected.--Based on the results of the expert appraisal process, we concluded that the CNE bulletins are supported by the records issued by the machines and are in full agreement with the databases,- he said.🧾❌ No votes acts were shown during the announcement.🗳️ Publication of results. -The CNE is urged to publish the final results in the Official Gazette,- said Rodríguez.⚖️ González's disregard. The official said that -candidate Edmundo González disregarded the mandate of this judicial authority by not submitting the electoral material, a conduct that carries the sanctions provided for in the law.-

Title: 🇹🇹More than 2,000 Venezuelan children were left out of Trinidad...
Description: 🇹🇹More than 2,000 Venezuelan children were left out of Trinidad's education systemTrinidad and Tobago schools will only accept 23 Venezuelan children in the new school year, which begins next September, leaving some 2,000 outside the education system.National Security Minister Fitzgerald Hinds said the schooling was intended only for children of Venezuelan immigrants legally registered in Trinidad and Tobago in 2019, according to statements made at a press conference and published on Tuesday by local media.

Title: Edmundo González: Venezuela voted for a country without persecuti...
Description: Edmundo González: Venezuela voted for a country without persecution or forced migrationIn a message published on X, the leader of the Democratic Unitary Platform (PUD) also said that Venezuelans voted -resoundingly- for -a country where currency has value,- public services -work,- there are -decent salaries and pensions,- an education that -generates opportunities- and -quality- hospitals.-That desire will not stop. Let us all work for the peaceful, orderly and guaranteed transition that Venezuela demands,- he added.

Title: FMV warned that more than 100 thousand teachers have left the pub...
Description: FMV warned that more than 100 thousand teachers have left the public system in the last two yearsThe Venezuelan Teachers Federation (FVM) reported that more than 100,000 teachers have resigned from the public education system in the last two years.-We have a large teacher shortage. The Ministry of Education had data from two years ago of 500,000 teachers. Today, the data is at 400,000 teachers, they gave us an estimate. This means that more than 100,000 teachers have left schools,- he warned in an interview with Circuito Onda on Tuesday, August 20.
